channel.title: java on Jerome Brette's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in java on Jerome Brette's Blog

item.title: Creating simple Java 10 server container
item.description: Goal Very often people associated Java to quite bulky and difficult to use in the microservice context, unless you have very large image containing the JRE. But since Java 9, Java did kind of catchup with golang on the subject. Where you can obtain a standalone executable when we running go build, java is now proposing jlink which always you to acheive a very similar result. The goal of this post is to build a container image as small as possible running Java.
